frontmatter.title: Leadership Coaching
frontmatter.description: Whether you’ve been leading in a personal or professional context, this one-on-one coaching is for you. From newly minted managers to executives who have lead for years, we all want to show up as the leader we want to be. Together we can amplify your superpowers as a leader, point out obstacles that might be getting in your way of the change you want, and focus on your inner game.

frontmatter.title: Wedding Photography

It’s being let loose with our favourite gear and the task of documenting the day of two people in love that we find both a serious responsibility and a good time.
